modName: ULTIMATE Spartacus - Andy Whitfield - Save Game
summary: This vanilla save will make you into the legend that is Andy Whitfield (from the epic TV Series, Spartacus - Blood and Sand)
descriptionHtml:
[b]RIP Andy Whitfield[/b]
After battling against non-Hodgkin Lymphoma after Spartacus Season 1 and going into remission, Andy had to battle once again when the disease came back and for 18 months he was in a fight for his life. Unfortunately this was one opponent he couldn\'t win against, Andy lost the battle and passed away in Sydney.
I did not know Andy personally, but to me he seemed like a hero of a man, I can\'t help but shed a tear when I hear his last words to his family, RIP Andy Whitfield, the man, the legend, the Spartacus. 


[b]Description :[/b]
This save game makes your character Spartacus (Andy Whitfield) ((the coolest guy to have ever lived))

THIS IS A CLEAN SAVE, NO MODS APART FROM THE FEW SKIN AND EYE TEXTURE REPLACERS =)

[i]Endorsement optional, but highly appreciated :)[/i]

-----

[b]Install:[/b]
Obviously NMM (Nexus Mod Manager) will not work with this as it is a save game.
So to install, just simply download which version you want, extract, and copy the save file to the directory

\"Documents\\My Games\\Skyrim\\Saves\"

-----

[b]Uninstall:[/b]
Remove the save from that folder above, or just delete it in game on the load menu.

-----

[b]IMPORTANT:[/b]
To get your character looking exactly as I have him the following mods are useful -

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/30/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=30] No More Blocky Faces.[/url] Latest Version \"No More Blocky Faces Version 1.5\"

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/4869/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=4869] Covereyes.[/url] Use \"Covereyes - Eyes 2\"

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=2488] Better males.[/url] Use \"Faces - Geonox Faces\"
*Install default which adds detail to the face, then install the optional \"smooth\" textures for a better look* (This must be done manually)

[url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2488/?tab=2&navtag=/ajax/modimages/?user=0|:|id=2488] Better males.[/url] Use \"Underwear - Default\"
*Install Default which adds more detail to the body, then install the optional \"hairless\" textures for a smooth hairless body* (This must be done manually)

Then after that\'s done Install the body texture in my optional files for the ULTIMATE Spartacus! :)

-----
author: Biggsamus
